current.about_text_1_title: Balance and agility in everyday life.
current.about_text_1_content: Life in the city is something we’ve learnt to embrace. Appreciating the variety: a kaleidoscope of cultures all in one place. It’s the little things that others might pass by in the blink of an eye that keeps us inspired. Daily tasks are adventures to be lived, not problems to be solved. We aspire to move easy. Balancing our everyday whilst challenging our ideas to evolve. Never compromising on quality or our values as individuals.
current.about_text_2_content: From the brand’s studio in Berlin, its focus remains on bespoke fabrics, tailored cuts, and notable detailing. Inspired by their friends, the city they call home and the places they choose to travel: this is what sets Ucon apart from their peers. This organic approach challenges the brand to constantly grow and progress.

settings.content: Modular is a powerful Shopify theme that will set you apart from the rest. It features ample space to showcase your imagery with Mosaic, Gallery, and Slideshow sections.

Chelsea.footer_location_1: Dan-ah Kim was born in Seoul and resides in Brooklyn, NY.
Chelsea.homepage_titlemodule_text: I work with mixed media, beginning with drawing and painting then layered with various papers and hand sewn elements. Through overlapping textures, I aim to enrich the experience of viewing the story.
Chelsea.homepage_video_body: A mysterious portrait of the beauty in decaying of natural wild life.
Chelsea.homepage_video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/47599357?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="500" height="281" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

Chelsea.about_text_1_content: Dan-ah Kim is a Brooklyn based artist and designer who freelances in film, televsion, and illustration. A graduate of Pratt Institute, she works in the art department of film and commercial sets, as well as making personal art. Her paintings and mixed media pieces have shown with galleries in California, Chicago, and New York.
